# NSFileHandleNotificationFileHandleItem

**Global Variable**

A key in the userinfo dictionary in a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSFileHandleConnectionAccepted] notification.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSFileHandleNotificationFileHandleItem: String
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is the `NSFileHandle` object representing the “near” end of a socket connection.

## Constants

- **NSFileHandleNotificationDataItem**: A key in the userinfo dictionary in a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileHandle/readCompletionNotification] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSFileHandleReadToEndOfFileCompletion].
- **NSFileHandleNotificationMonitorModes**: Currently unused.
